amendment.description: An amendment numbered 75 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds from going towards USDA's Climate Hubs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
